===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|蝙蝠|tr1=kōmori|t1=bat|傘|tr2=kasa|t2=umbrella|lang=ja|sort=こうもりがさ}}. {{rendaku2|kasa|gasa|sort=こうもりがさ}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|こうもりがさ|acc=5|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こうもりがさ|hhira=かうもりがさ}}

# a Western-style [[umbrella]] (most modern umbrellas)

====Usage notes====
Usually [[傘]] is used to refer to umbrellas. This word is widely known but relatively seldom used.
